metadata.dc:author: Mateost Poumian, A
metadata.dc:description: The author provides an outline of the basic procedure for cleaning and disinfecting road transport vehicles, with special attention to the types of cleaning agents which may be used.
metadata.dc:title: Disinfection of trucks and trailers.
metadata.dc:publisher: Revue scientifique et technique (International Office of Epizootics)
